item.title: Password Managers and their Role in Online Safety and Security
item.description: Table of Contents What are Password Managers? What Problem they Solve? Features of Password Managers Proprietary Password Managers LastPass: 1Password: Dashlane: FOSS Password Managers KeePass: Padloc: Bitwarden: Some honorable mentions: Why to use FOSS Password Managers? Bitwarden: A Short Intro Bitwarden: Premium Features Conclusion 1) What are Password Managers? A computer program which acts as a wallet for storing, managing passwords as well as offer the feature to generate strong and complicated passwords for applications and services.
